# endpoint

**Instance Property**

The destination endpoint with which this session was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var endpoint: NWEndpoint { get }
```

## Getting session properties

- **currentPath**: The current evaluated path for the session’s [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSession/resolvedEndpoint] property.
